contentrichtext.text: '''Joplin''' may refer to: ==Places== ;United States *[[Joplin, Missouri]] **[[Joplin, Missouri metropolitan area]] *[[Joplin, Montana]] *[[Joplin, Texas]] *[[Joplin, Virginia]] (now extinct) *[[Joplin, West Virginia]] ==People== *[[Joplin (surname)]], people with the surname, including: **[[Janis Joplin]] (1943–1970), American singer-songwriter **[[Scott Joplin]] (c. 1867–1917), American ragtime composer ==Others== *[[Joplin High School]], a public High School in Joplin, Missouri *[[Joplin Miners]], a defunct minor league baseball team in Joplin, Missouri *[[Joplin Regional Airport]], a regional airport next to Joplin, Missouri *[[Joplin Tundra]], a family of Canadian aircraft ==See also== *[[2011 Joplin tornado]], an extreme tornado that devastated Joplin, Missouri {{disambig}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]]
